Text: Re Credit Derivatives Issue Cc As an individual market participant we regard plain vanilla CB as not contingent But still we add some wordings to clarify this point on the confirmations Best Regards Koshikawa Robert Pickel PM ISDA BOARD cc Kimberly Summe Louise Marshall ibccFz aFfocT j Credit Derivatives Issue
